sentences.en: All employees will refer to each other by the honorific suffix "san".
sentences.cn: 所有雇员相互称呼时都须在名字后添加敬语san（日语表示“先生”，“女士”）。

sentences.en: But he then went on to refer very directly to the argument.
sentences.cn: 不过接下来他就直切主题提到了那场争论。

sentences.en: By way of illustration I'll refer to the behavior of rabbits.
sentences.cn: 我将举例说明兔子的行为.

sentences.en: Does your remark refer to all of us?
sentences.cn: 你的评论是针对我们所有人的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't refer to the matter again.
For further particulars I refer you to my secretary.
He could refer the matter to the high court.
sentences.cn: 他可以将此事交由高等法院裁决。

sentences.en: He referred briefly to his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他迅速查看了一下他的笔记。

sentences.en: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.cn: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

sentences.en: May I refer you back to my earlier remarks on this subject?
sentences.cn: 是否让我向你重提一下我在这个主题上先前讲述的话?

sentences.en: Only your family doctor can refer you to a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 只有你的家庭医生才能把你介绍给外科医生。

sentences.en: That remark does not refer to [ direct at ] her.
The cross - references refer you to information in other parts of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 互见引导你在词典的其他部分寻找信息.

sentences.en: The new law does not refer to land used for farming.
sentences.cn: 那条新法律并不涉及耕种用地.

sentences.en: The regulations refer only to children.
sentences.cn: 这些规定只适用于小孩子.

sentences.en: Writers often refer to a dictionary.

words.tran_cn: 可归因于…；可参考的；可交付的；可涉及的
参考，参照；涉及，提及；参考书目；介绍信；证明书
引用（reference的过去分词）；附…以供参考

phrases.tran_cn: (英)（银行拒付用语）请询问出票人

trans.tran_cn: 提及，涉及，称作，参考，转医院，送交，推荐，指引，描述
trans.tran_en: If you refer to a particular subject or person, you talk about them or mention them
